channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 dead and 10 wounded in shooting at banquet hall in Stockton, California
item.description: Four people were killed and 10 wounded in a shooting during a family gathering at a banquet hall in Stockton, sheriff's officials said Saturday.

item.title: The Setup Murder of Kristil Krug
item.description: A stalker sends menacing messages to a young mother before she is murdered. The investigation reveals a sinister setup. "48 Hour" correspondent Peter ...

item.title: Store receipt provides alibi for Utah man eyed in murder 500 miles away
item.description: Weeks before Kristil Krug, a married mother of three, was found murdered in her Colorado garage, she told police she and her husband Dan Krug had rece...

item.title: Drinking is a way of life in Ireland. Can a warning label change that?
item.description: The labels, which warn of cancer risks, are among the strongest warnings on alcohol anywhere in the world.

item.title: Suspect in National Guard attack struggled with ‘dark isolation’ as community raised concerns
item.description: The Afghan man accused of gunning down two National Guard members blocks from the White House last week had been unraveling for years.

item.title: Venezuela condemns Trump's threat to close country's airspace
item.description: US President Donald Trump says airspace over Venezuela should be considered closed "in its entirety" as tensions mount between the two countries.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Hundreds dead and missing in flooding across South East Asia
item.description: The region is hit by some of the worst floods in years, with millions affected in Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand.

item.title: Investigation into woman's murder exposes an elaborate stalking plot
item.description: Kristil Krug told police in Broomfield, Colorado, that she and her husband, Dan Krug, were receiving threatening texts and emails from an ex-boyfriend...

item.title: Four killed in shooting at child's birthday party in California
item.description: Police say 10 others are injured in what they believe is a "targeted" shooting, with children among the victims.

item.title: Ukraine hits tankers in Black Sea in escalation against Russia
item.description: The two ships struck by drones were thought to be used to bypass Western sanctions on Russia.

item.title: 4 killed, 10 wounded in shooting at "family gathering" in Stockton, officials say
item.description: The suspect in the shooting remains at large, authorities said.

item.title: A major winter storm disrupts travel as millions head home after Thanksgiving

item.title: Acclaimed playwright Tom Stoppard dies at 88
item.description: Tom Stoppard is remembered as a playwright whose wit and curiosity reshaped modern theater.

item.title: FDA to raise hurdles for vaccines, faulting COVID shots for 10 kids' deaths

item.title: US halts all asylum decisions after shooting of National Guard members
Trump officials and judge face off over flights to El Salvador in rare, high-stakes contempt probe
